This is a XRF parsing tool designed for parsing Chemistry data set out put from the OLYMPUS VANTA pXRF

# Requirements

- OLYMPUS VANTA pXRF.
- GeoChem export method

The export format of of the csv should be in the GeoChem format with Item notes set to `LAB_ID`.
Note that the program can not read data with `<LOD` values outputted, and `<LOD` values need to be set to `0` before uploading the data file.
